items.sentence: Don\'t hesitate to ask your teacher a question.
Don\'t let such a good opportunity go to waste.
Don\'t let this codebook fall into enemy hands.
Don\'t let your children become couch potatoes.
Don\'t live like you want to, live how you can.
I don\'t see why Tom wouldn\'t want to do that.
This party is kind of boring, don\'t you think?
When I saw her recently, she looked very happy.
When he finished speaking, everyone was silent.
When she heard the news, she broke down crying.
When the bomb exploded, I happened to be there.
When we arrived, the lecture had already begun.
We haven\'t seen each other since we were kids.
We shouldn\'t do anything about that right now.
When you come to Boston, I\'ll show you around.
You shouldn\'t park in front of a fire hydrant.
You\'re not really going to wear that, are you?
Would you like to go to the zoo this afternoon?
You should keep your valuables in a safe place.
Didn\'t you know Tom and I often sing together?
Here\'s a list of things that Tom needs to buy.
How many times do you think you\'ve eaten here?
The truth is that I can\'t speak French at all.
The only language that Tom can speak is French.
The police say they know you had an accomplice.
The police suspect that Tom is a serial killer.
I appreciate the gesture, but it\'s not enough.
My advice is to tell Tom what he wants to know.
My father drinks a cup of coffee every morning.
I\'d like to have a few minutes alone with Tom.
I\'d like to read some books about the Beatles.
I\'d like to say a few words by way of apology.
I\'d like to stay here for as long as possible.
I\'d love to live in Australia for a few years.
Tom couldn\'t have done that without your help.
I\'m really looking forward to summer vacation.
I\'m sending you a birthday present by airmail.
I wish that it hadn\'t happened the way it did.
I wish you could\'ve seen the stars last night.
You\'re a lot younger than Tom is, aren\'t you?
Would you mind if we asked you a few questions?
Would you mind speaking a little softer please?
Would you please tell me what I should do next?
Would you rather read a novel or watch a movie?
Can you still play golf as well as you used to?
Did you hear about the big earthquake in Japan?
Tom\'s palms were sweaty and his mouth was dry.
Tom bled to death before the ambulance arrived.
Tom borrowed a large amount of money from Mary.
Tom bought a bicycle for three hundred dollars.
